hibernate-mapping.query: FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateSectorsDO rateSector where rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryType =:rateProductCategoryType AND rateSector.sectorDO.sectorType = 'A' ORDER BY rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId, rateSector.sectorType, rateSector.sectorDO.calculationOrder

FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateSectorsDO rateSector where rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryType =:rateProductCategoryType ORDER BY rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryId, rateSector.sectorType, rateSector.sectorDO.calculationOrder,rateSector.sectorDO.sectorType

FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateSectorsDO rateSector WHERE rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode =:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryCode =:rateProductCategoryType AND rateSector.sectorDO.sectorType = 'A' AND rateSector.sectorType ='D' ORDER BY rateSector.sectorDO.calculationOrder

FROM com.ff.domain.ratemanagement.masters.RateSectorsDO rateSector WHERE rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateCustomerCategoryDO.rateCustomerCategoryCode=:rateCustomerCategoryCode AND rateSector.rateCustomerProductCatMapDO.rateProductCategoryDO.rateProductCategoryCode=:rateProductCategoryType AND rateSector.sectorType='D' ORDER BY rateSector.sectorDO.calculationOrder
